sentences.english: He kept chopping about from kindness to cruelty towards his pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他对学生们忽而和蔼可亲，忽而冷酷无情。

sentences.english: Some men are cold, they're callous and they're mean.
sentences.chinese: 有的男人冷酷无情，吝啬不堪。
他是个冷酷无情的衣冠禽兽。

sentences.english: But the Queen Mother of ruthless, and finally he just break up this pair of happy couples.
sentences.chinese: 然而王母冷酷无情，最后硬是拆散了这对恩爱夫妻。

sentences.english: Capitalism, perhaps at its most remorseless, is a physical manifestation of psychopathy.
sentences.chinese: 冷酷无情的资本主义正是精神疾病的物质表现。
她冷酷无情的态度引起我的反感。

sentences.english: Scarlett becomes hard-hearted as she works to save the farm and house.
sentences.chinese: 郝思嘉努力工作拯救农场及家园，变得冷酷无情。

sentences.english: He stretched himself on her threshold and uttered his complaints to the cruel bolts and bars .
sentences.chinese: 他匍伏在她门槛上对着冷酷无情的插销门栓倾诉哀怨。

sentences.english: He needled me with his heartlessness.
sentences.chinese: 他的冷酷无情刺伤了我的心。
贪婪使他变得冷酷无情。

sentences.english: And you are one cold-hearted person.
sentences.chinese: 而你则是一个冷酷无情的人。

sentences.english: I did not think Charles would have been so unfeeling.
sentences.chinese: 我原来以为他不至于会这么冷酷无情。

sentences.english: But none was as ruthless as Gul'dan.
sentences.chinese: 但是没有人比古尔丹更冷酷无情。

sentences.english: Nor silver - shedding tears could penetrate her uncompassionate sire.
sentences.chinese: 银光闪闪的泪花也不能打动她冷酷无情的父亲。
贪婪使他变得冷酷无情。

sentences.english: Sincere words reacted on the cold-hearted person.
sentences.chinese: 真诚的话语对这个冷酷无情的人起了作用。

definition: lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
